text.headline: The principal mechanism of COVID-19 infection is aerosol

media.caption: Laser-induced fluorescence is a method of using lasers to cause specific substances to emit light
media.credit: By Jan Pavelka/Wikimedia Commons, CC BY-SA

text.headline: Growing body of research
text.text: A growing body of research shows that SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, can spread from person to person through the air. Indoor spaces with poor ventilation in areas where the virus is prevalent are particularly hazardous. Article on TheConversation by Suresh Dhaniyala, Priyamvada Ravindran and Shantanu Sur.
